Target: An ontology defined for representing the district heating network

Comment: Represents a grid-bound district heating system that transfer heat to residential or commercial buildings
Label: Heating network

Comment: Grid point at which (thermodynamic) properties are observed, i.e., flow and return temperature for heat feed in
Label: Grid connection

Comment: provides heat to the district heating network
Label: Heat provider

Comment: A utility that is wholly owned or operated by a municipality to provide service to the public
Label: Municipal utility

Comment: A device for converting fuel or electricity into heat
Label: Heat generator

Comment: Individuals or businesses or a group thereof that consume heat
Label: Consumer

Comment: A closed, pressure vessel that uses fuel for heating water or other fluids to supply steam or hot water for heating
Label: Heat boiler

Comment: Turbine that converts chemical energy of fuel into heat and electricity by internal combustion
Label: Gas turbine

Comment: Planned or anticipated availability of an asset (true or false)
Label: Availability

Comment: A mixture of gases which are rich in hydrocarbons
Label: Natural gas

Comment: Amount of carbon dioxide produced per megawatt-hour of energy produced from a given fossil fuel source
Label: CO2 factor

Comment: Total energy released as heat when a substance undergoes complete combustion with oxygen under standard conditions
Label: Calorific value

Comment: Includes all revenue associated with co-generation of electricity in gas turbine in a particular time period
Label: Co-gen revenue in time interval

Comment: Unit price of heat based on the quantity purchased
Label: Tiered unit price

Comment: Individual tier within the tiered unit price, i.e., unitprice for particular purchase window
Label: Tier

Comment: Unit price for purchasing heat energy
Label: Heat unit price

Comment: Also known as energy-from-waste (EfW) plant
Label: Incineration plant

Comment: Hypernym of unit cost and unit price
Label: Unit rate

Comment: Saved grid charges for each “avoided” MWh electricity sourced from the grid
Label: Grid charges

Comment: Electricity spot price for sold electricity
Label: Electricity spot price

Comment: Bonus from combined-heat-and-power gas turbine, i.e., subsidy
Label: CHP bonus

Comment: Unit cost of CO2 emission certificates
Label: CO2 certificate price

Comment: Unit cost for used fuel
Label: Fuel unit cost

Comment: Unit cost for labour
Label: Hourly labour cost

Comment: Cost per hour for wear
Label: Hourly wear cost

Comment: Cost per megawatt hour for wear
Label: Demand driven wear cost

Comment: Unit cost for used natural gas
Label: Gas unit cost

Comment: Includes all variable cost associated with heat generator
Label: Variable cost

Comment: Cost for the fuel that is used by heat generator
Label: Fuel cost

Comment: Cost for switching on and off the heat generator
Label: Switching cost

Comment: Cost for starting up the heat generator
Label: Start-up cost

Comment: Cost for shutting down the heat generator
Label: Shut-down cost

Comment: Demand-dependent wear cost for heat boiler
Label: Variable wear cost

Comment: Fixed wear cost for gas turbine
Label: Fixed wear cost

Comment: Includes carbon emission cost associated with heat generator
Label: Emission cost

Comment: Includes all fixed cost associated with heat generator
Label: Fixed cost

Comment: Personnel cost of operation
Label: Labour cost

Comment: In a particular time interval
Label: Energy in time interval

Comment: In a particular time interval
Label: Cost in time interval

Comment: In a particular time interval
Label: Duration in time interval

Comment: Specifics of date, i.e., weekday,weekend, vacation,…
Label: Calendar effects

Comment: A phase system property that can serve as an intensive thermodynamic state variable
Label: Thermodynamic state property

Comment: Represents an individual property of a system
Label: Property

Comment: Type of fuel used by the heat generator
Label: Fuel type

Comment: CO2 emission generated in specific time interval
Label: CO2 emission in time interval

Comment: Heat storage in the district heating system
Label: Thermal energy storage

Comment: Agreement between competent parties to which the parties agree to be legally bound, and for which the parties provide valuable consideration
Label: Contract

Comment: A prediction or estimation of a quantity
Label: Forecast

Comment: Temperature of the outside air that would be indicated by a thermometer exposed to the air at a location sheltered from direct solar radiation
Label: Air temperature

Comment: Includes all costs associated with heat generator
Label: Cost

Domain: http://www.ontology-of-units-of-measure.org/resource/om-2/Measure UNION http://www.theworldavatar.com/ontology/ontoems/OntoEMS.owl#Forecast UNION Availability UNION http://www.theworldavatar.com/ontology/ontoems/OntoEMS.owl#AirTemperature UNION CalendarEffect UNION CoGenRevenueInTimeInterval
Comment: A relationship between a measure or forecast and the respective time series.
Label: has time series

Domain: http://www.ontology-of-units-of-measure.org/resource/om-2/Measure UNION http://www.theworldavatar.com/ontology/ontoems/OntoEMS.owl#Forecast UNION Availability UNION http://www.theworldavatar.com/ontology/ontoems/OntoEMS.owl#AirTemperature UNION CalendarEffect UNION CoGenRevenueInTimeInterval
Label: has time series

Domain: CostInTimeInterval UNION http://www.ontology-of-units-of-measure.org/resource/om-2/Temperature UNION UnitRate UNION Availability UNION DurationInTimeInterval UNION CO2EmissionInTimeInterval UNION EnergyInTimeInterval UNION CoGenRevenueInTimeInterval
Comment: A relationship between a quantity and its forecast.
Label: has forecasted value

Comment: A relationship between a forecast and its creation time.
Label: created on

Domain: UnitRate UNION CostInTimeInterval UNION http://www.theworldavatar.com/ontology/ontocape/material/phase_system/phase_system.owl#ThermodynamicStateProperty UNION http://www.ontology-of-units-of-measure.org/resource/om-2/Power UNION DurationInTimeInterval UNION CO2EmissionInTimeInterval UNION EnergyInTimeInterval
Label: has value

Comment: A relationship between a measure and the respective unit of measure
Label: has unit

Comment: A relationship between a forecast and the respective unit of measure
Label: has unit

Comment: A relationship between heat generator and various cost associated with it
Label: has cost

Comment: A relationship between a company and the entities it owns
Label: is owner of

Comment: A relationship between gas turbine and its co-generated electricity revenue
Label: has revenue

Comment: A relationship between heat generator/plant item and CO2 emission per time interval (in specific time interval)
Label: has individual CO2 emission

Comment: A relationship between heat generator and its fuel type
Label: has fuel type

Comment: A relationship between incineration plant/heat generator and its anticipated operating availability
Label: has operating availability

Comment: A relationship between incineration plant and the heat amount it has provided to the network
Label: has provided heat amount

Comment: A relationship between incineration plant and the maximum heat amount it can provide per hour
Label: has maximum hourly supply

Comment: A relationship between incineration plant and the minimum heat amount it can provide per hour
Label: has minimum hourly supply

Comment: A relationship between a fuel and its CO2 factor
Label: has CO2 factor

Comment: A relationship between a fuel and its higher caloric value
Label: has higher calorific value

Comment: A relationship between a fuel and its lower caloric value
Label: has lower calorific value

Comment: A relationship between heat generator and its rated thermal power
Label: has rated thermal power

Comment: A relationship between heat generator and its previous/planned operating time
Label: has operating time

Comment: A relationship between heat generator and previous/planned heat amount generated
Label: has generated heat amount

Comment: A relationship between heat generator and previous/planned gas amount consumed
Label: has consumed gas amount

Comment: Minimum duration between 2 subsequent gas turbine operations (due to technical limits)
Label: has minimum idle time

Comment: A relationship between gas turbine and its rated electrical power
Label: has rated electrical power

Comment: A relationship between gas turbine and its minimum thermal load (due to emission regulation)
Label: has minimum thermal load

Comment: A relationship between gas turbine and co-generated electricity amount
Label: has co-generated electricity amount

Comment: A relationship between a contract and minimum quantity to be purchased annually, e.g., take or pay contract
Label: has minimum annual purchase volume

Comment: A relationship between a contract and maximum quantity to be purchased annually
Label: has maximum annual purchase volume

Comment: A relationship between a contract and the fulfilling party, e.g.., party which provides heat
Label: is fulfilled by

Comment: A relationship between heat provider and the heating network
Label: provides heat to

Comment: A relationship between heating network and consumer
Label: supplies heat to

Comment: A relationship between heat provider and upstream grid connection, i.e., return flow
Label: has upstream grid connection

Comment: A relationship between heat provider and downstream grid connection, i.e., flow
Label: has downstream grid connection

Comment: A relationship between consumer and heat demand
Label: has heat demand

Comment: A relationship between heating network and its minimum volumetric flow rate, i.e., due to minimum pump speed of installed pumps
Label: has minimum flow rate

Comment: A relationship between heating network and grid connection/grid points
Label: has part

Comment: A relationship between grid connection and observed thermodynamic properties at that location
Label: has observable properties

Comment: A relationship between municipal utility and heating network that it operates
Label: operates

Comment: A relationship between municipal utility and the purchase agreement signed in a contract with another heat provider
Label: has purchase agreement

Comment: A relationship between contract and tiered unit price
Label: has tiered unit price

Comment: A relationship between contract and current heat unit price based on relative purchases according to tiers
Label: has current unit price

Comment: A relationship between a tier and its cumulative energy cap
Label: has cumulative energy cap

Comment: A relationship between a tier and the associated heat unit price
Label: has unit price

Comment: A relationship between tiered unit price and tier
Label: has tier

Comment: Indication whether a particular date is holiday
Label: is holiday

Comment: Indication whether a particular date is vacation
Label: is vacation

Comment: A date associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource
Label: date

Domain: HeatingNetwork UNION MunicipalUtility UNION HeatBoiler UNION GasTurbine UNION Contract
Comment: Textual description of instance
Label: label
